mapper.select:
select m.id,m.machine_code,m.machine_status, CONCAT(aa.province, aa.city, aa.district,IFNULL( l.mall,""),IFNULL( l.name,"")) local_desc, m.net_status,l.type as machine_type,m.inside_time from inno72_machine m left join inno72_locale l on m.locale_id=l.id left join inno72_admin_area aa on l.area_code=aa.code where machine_status!=-1 and LEFT(l.area_code,#{num})='${code}'
AND (m.machine_code LIKE '%${machineCode}%' or l.mall LIKE '%${machineCode}%' or l.name LIKE '%${machineCode}%')
and l.type=#{machineType} and m.machine_status=#{machineStatus}
AND ( #{startTime} <= m.inside_time AND #{endTime} >= m.inside_time )
and 9=9 order by m.update_time desc

select m.*, CONCAT_WS('-',aa.province,aa.city,aa.district,l.mall,l.name) local_str from inno72_machine m left join inno72_locale l on m.locale_id=l.id left join inno72_admin_area aa on l.area_code=aa.code where m.id=#{machineId}
select s.machine_code from inno72_machine s where s.machine_status = #{machineStatus}

select * from ( SELECT m.id,m.machine_code, CONCAT( area.province,area.city,area.district,IFNULL(l.mall,""),IFNULL(l.name,"") ) AS local_desc, date_format(ap.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS start_time, date_format(ap.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS end_time, a.name AS activity_name, CASE WHEN ap.start_time > NOW() THEN '1' WHEN ap.start_time < NOW() and ap.end_time > NOW() THEN '2' ELSE null END state, l.area_code FROM inno72_machine m LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area area on area.code=l.area_code LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan_machine apm on apm.machine_id = m.id LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan ap ON ap.id = apm.activity_plan_id and ap.is_delete = 0 and NOW() < ap.end_time
AND ( #{startTime} <= ap.end_time AND #{endTime} >= ap.start_time )
LEFT JOIN inno72_activity a ON a.id = ap.activity_id where m.machine_status ='4' and LEFT(l.area_code,#{num})='${code}'
AND m.machine_code LIKE '%${machineCode}%'
and 9=9 ) o order by area_code

select * from ( SELECT m.id, m.machine_code, CONCAT( area.province, area.city, area.district, IFNULL( l.mall, "" ), IFNULL( l.NAME, "" ) ) AS local_desc, mt.name AS activity_name, CASE WHEN mt.start_time > NOW() THEN '1' WHEN mt.start_time < NOW() and mt.end_time > NOW() THEN '2' ELSE null END state, date_format( mt.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS start_time, date_format( mt.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS end_time, l.area_code FROM inno72_machine m LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area area ON area.CODE = l.area_code LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.`name`,im.machine_id,mt.start_time,mt.end_time FROM inno72_interact t LEFT JOIN inno72_interact_machine im ON im.interact_id = t.id LEFT JOIN inno72_interact_machine_time mt ON mt.interact_machine_id = im.id WHERE t.is_delete = 0 ) mt ON mt.machine_id=m.id and NOW() < mt.end_time
AND ( #{startTime} <= mt.end_time AND #{endTime} >= mt.start_time )
WHERE m.machine_status = '4' and LEFT(l.area_code,#{num})='${code}'
AND m.machine_code LIKE '%${machineCode}%'
and 9=9 ) o order by area_code

select m.id,m.machine_code ,if(aa.province=aa.city,CONCAT_WS('-',aa.province,aa.district,l.mall), CONCAT_WS('-',aa.province,aa.city,aa.district,l.mall)) local from ( select apm.machine_id,apg.goods_id,( select IFNULL( sum(sc.goods_count),0) gc from inno72_supply_channel sc left join inno72_supply_channel_goods scg on sc.id=scg.supply_channel_id where sc.machine_id=apm.machine_id and scg.goods_id=apg.goods_id) gc from inno72_activity_plan ap left join inno72_activity_plan_machine apm on ap.id=apm.activity_plan_id left join inno72_activity_plan_goods apg on ap.id=apg.activity_plan_id where NOW() BETWEEN ap.start_time and ap.end_time and ap.is_delete!=1 order by apm.machine_id ) a left join inno72_machine m on a.machine_id=m.id LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area aa on aa.code=l.area_code where m.id is not null group by a.machine_id HAVING sum(a.gc)<=15

select m.id,m.machine_code ,if(aa.province=aa.city,CONCAT_WS('-',aa.province,aa.district,l.mall), CONCAT_WS('-',aa.province,aa.city,aa.district,l.mall)) local from inno72_machine m LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area aa on aa.code=l.area_code where m.machine_status=4

select g.name good_name,( select IFNULL( sum(sc.goods_count),0) gc from inno72_supply_channel sc left join inno72_supply_channel_goods scg on sc.id=scg.supply_channel_id where sc.machine_id=apm.machine_id and scg.goods_id=apg.goods_id) good_count from inno72_activity_plan ap left join inno72_activity_plan_machine apm on ap.id=apm.activity_plan_id left join inno72_activity_plan_goods apg on ap.id=apg.activity_plan_id left join inno72_goods g on apg.goods_id=g.id where NOW() BETWEEN ap.start_time and ap.end_time and ap.is_delete!=1 and apm.machine_id = #{machineId}
